Passport Passport Shop ALLE ANZEIGEN Topseller Shirts Tops Strick Sweats Blusen Kleider & Röcke Hosen & Jeans Jacken & Mäntel Accessoires Modeberatung Trends Sale Passport Live Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco SPRING/SUMMER 2015 AUTUMN/WINTER 2015/16 SPRING/SUMMER 2016 Sie hier: Startseite Company Presse Company Kontakt Philosophie Key Facts Storefinder Showrooms Jobs & Karriere B2B-Shop Presse Presse Der Mini Cooper Modebranche Passport Marken, Echtes DNA haben, sind, Begehrlichkeit auslösen. Gegründet Jahr 1978 Anfang 1981 heutigen Standort Böblingen beheimatet, zählt Passport mittlerweile international erfolgreichsten Modemarken Bereich Contemporary Fashion. Am Firmensitz Böblingen arbeiten 50 Mitarbeiter. Charakteristisch für Marke Macher, stehen, moderne offene Architektur Glas Chrom. Kompromisslos perfektionistisch Design detailverliebt hochwertigen Ausstattung. Sinn für Ästhetik, Stil Geschmack schaffen einzigartige Atmosphäre Modernität, gepaart Lässigkeit hohem Wohlfühlcharakter. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Frank Gouder verknüpft, 1989 Unternehmen Geschäftsführer generelle Linie, Architektur Unternehmen, Marke Produkt vorgibt. Kongenial ergänzt Frau Daniela Kromer-Gouder, Design verantwortet geschmückte, feminine, dekorative Seite Kollektion einfließen lässt. Es entstehen permanent Produkte, moderne Frauen Welt begeistern Passport-Fans machen. Frauen, lebensfroh, aktiv, vielseitig interessiert informiert sind. Die Stil kennen bewusst modernen, selbstverständlich anmutenden Stil-Mix suchen. Looks Passport können überraschen, mal cool rockig, unkonstruiert lässig daher. Getreu Motto Kollektion: contemporary, feminin relaxt. Was Mode Passport auszeichnet? - Ziemlich viel, "Upgrading" Unternehmensphilosophie. Mehrwert doppelt generiert. Zum über Produkt hoher Performance, höchste Qualität, perfekte Passform sensationelles Preis-/Leistungs-Verhältnis Passport Maxime, gelebte Realität. Zum über Emotionalität, Lifestyle Lebensgefühl Marke. Frank Gouder vergleicht Passport gerne cleveren Gesamtkonzept Mini Coopers. Für Zielgruppe Minis Größe Fahrzeugs kaufentscheidend, Produktsubstanz Individualität Premium-Image. Der Mini klar Kult. Ähnlich geschärft Profil, klar Positionierung Fachhandel konsequent modern innovativ Markeninszenierung sieht Frank Gouder Passport. Die Kollektion bietet klare Images, grenzt stilistisch Mitbewerbern bietet Kundin hohes Maß Identifikation. In Vertriebsfragen setzt Passport intensive Partnerschaften führenden Fachhändlern, z.B. Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck München, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen Kastner & Öhler Graz. Hier Markeninszenierung zelebriert - Passport Looks können Markenkonform Zielgruppengenau präsentiert werden. Ein qualitativer Ausbau bestehenden Partnerschaften Akquise potentiell interessanten Händlern steht fest Agenda Frank Gouder Team. Eine Distribution über Stores derzeitig geplant. Wohl virtuelle Vertikalisierung über Online-Store. Ein Garant hohen Produktperformance Passport langjährige enge Zusammenarbeit ausgewählten Produktionsstätten. Passport produziert überwiegend China, Türkei, Italien, Griechenland Vietnam. Regelmäßige Besuche Ort hohes Maß Übereinstimmung puncto Nachhaltigkeit gemeinsames Wertebewußtsein selbstverständlich. Die Erfolgsgeschichte Passport täglich weitergeschrieben - schließlich wächst Fangemeinde Mini unaufhörlich. The Fashion World's Mini Cooper Passport is one of the brands with authenticity their DNA, not simply known, but known to be coveted. Founded 1978 and located at its present base, Böblingen, since 1981, Passport is now regarded as one of the internationally most successful fashion brands the Contemporary Fashion segment. The company headquarters Böblingen employs about 50 people. Its modern, open architecture, heavy with glass and chrome, is characteristic of the brand and the makers behind it. Uncompromised perfectionism its design and love for detail its high quality features. A sense of aestheticism, style, and taste are creating inimitable atmosphere of modernity coupled with casual high feel good factor. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. He is complemented by kindred spirit, his wife Daniela Kromer-Gouder, who is responsible for the designs and adds stylish, feminine, ornamental side to the collection. New products appear on permanent basis to inspire ever more modern women all over the world and turn them into Passport aficionadas. Women who are life affirming, active, widely interested and well informed. These women know their own personal style and consciously seek modern mix of styles with matter-of-course appearance. Looks by Passport may surprise you, they may be cool or rock-‘n’-roll, but they are always casual and never forced. True to the motto of collection: contemporary, feminine and relaxed. What is it that sets Passport fashion apart? - A lot, for “upgrading” is company principle here. Value is generated not once, but twice. First by high performance product, since highest quality, perfect fit and sensational price-performance ratio are more than rule, they are actual reality. Then by the emotional appeal, the lifestyle and the attitude of our brand. Frank Gouder likes to compare Passport to the clever overall concept of the Mini Cooper. For the target group of the Mini, it is not the size of the vehicle that is decisive for the purchase, but its product substance and most of all its individuality and its premium image. The Mini clearly is icon. Frank Gouder sees Passport as similarly distinct its profile, clear it’s positioning with retailers, and unconditionally modern and innovative its brand staging. The collection shows clear-cut images, style distinct from that of its competitors, and it offers the customer the opportunity for high degree of identification. This is why, regard to distribution, Passport counts on close partnerships with leading retailers, as for instance Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck Munich, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen and Kastner & Öhler Graz. The brand staging is celebrated there – it is possible to present the Passport looks brand-compliant manner aimed at specific target groups. Increasing the quality of existing partnerships is high priority for Frank Gouder and his team, just as the acquisition of potentially interesting new dealers. A distribution via own stores is not planned at the moment, but virtual verticalization per online store is. Passport's high product performance is guaranteed by its long-standing cooperation with selected production facilities. Passport produces primarily China, Turkey, Italy, Greece, and Vietnam. Regular visits on site, just as extensive agreement on sustainability and common set of values, are understood. Passport's success story is still being written every day – after all, the fan community of the Mini Cooper continues to grow steadily. Passport Passport Shop ALLE ANZEIGEN Topseller Shirts Tops Strick Sweats Blusen Kleider & Röcke Hosen & Jeans Jacken & Mäntel Accessoires Modeberatung Trends Sale Passport Live Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco SPRING/SUMMER 2015 AUTUMN/WINTER 2015/16 SPRING/SUMMER 2016 Sie hier: Startseite Company Presse Company Kontakt Philosophie Key Facts Storefinder Showrooms Jobs & Karriere B2B-Shop Presse Presse Der Mini Cooper Modebranche Passport Marken, Echtes DNA haben, sind, Begehrlichkeit auslösen. Gegründet Jahr 1978 Anfang 1981 heutigen Standort Böblingen beheimatet, zählt Passport mittlerweile international erfolgreichsten Modemarken Bereich Contemporary Fashion. Am Firmensitz Böblingen arbeiten 50 Mitarbeiter. Charakteristisch für Marke Macher, stehen, moderne offene Architektur Glas Chrom. Kompromisslos perfektionistisch Design detailverliebt hochwertigen Ausstattung. Sinn für Ästhetik, Stil Geschmack schaffen einzigartige Atmosphäre Modernität, gepaart Lässigkeit hohem Wohlfühlcharakter. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Frank Gouder verknüpft, 1989 Unternehmen Geschäftsführer generelle Linie, Architektur Unternehmen, Marke Produkt vorgibt. Kongenial ergänzt Frau Daniela Kromer-Gouder, Design verantwortet geschmückte, feminine, dekorative Seite Kollektion einfließen lässt. Es entstehen permanent Produkte, moderne Frauen Welt begeistern Passport-Fans machen. Frauen, lebensfroh, aktiv, vielseitig interessiert informiert sind. Die Stil kennen bewusst modernen, selbstverständlich anmutenden Stil-Mix suchen. Looks Passport können überraschen, mal cool rockig, unkonstruiert lässig daher. Getreu Motto Kollektion: contemporary, feminin relaxt. Was Mode Passport auszeichnet? - Ziemlich viel, "Upgrading" Unternehmensphilosophie. Mehrwert doppelt generiert. Zum über Produkt hoher Performance, höchste Qualität, perfekte Passform sensationelles Preis-/Leistungs-Verhältnis Passport Maxime, gelebte Realität. Zum über Emotionalität, Lifestyle Lebensgefühl Marke. Frank Gouder vergleicht Passport gerne cleveren Gesamtkonzept Mini Coopers. Für Zielgruppe Minis Größe Fahrzeugs kaufentscheidend, Produktsubstanz Individualität Premium-Image. Der Mini klar Kult. Ähnlich geschärft Profil, klar Positionierung Fachhandel konsequent modern innovativ Markeninszenierung sieht Frank Gouder Passport. Die Kollektion bietet klare Images, grenzt stilistisch Mitbewerbern bietet Kundin hohes Maß Identifikation. In Vertriebsfragen setzt Passport intensive Partnerschaften führenden Fachhändlern, z.B. Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck München, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen Kastner & Öhler Graz. Hier Markeninszenierung zelebriert - Passport Looks können Markenkonform Zielgruppengenau präsentiert werden. Ein qualitativer Ausbau bestehenden Partnerschaften Akquise potentiell interessanten Händlern steht fest Agenda Frank Gouder Team. Eine Distribution über Stores derzeitig geplant. Wohl virtuelle Vertikalisierung über Online-Store. Ein Garant hohen Produktperformance Passport langjährige enge Zusammenarbeit ausgewählten Produktionsstätten. Passport produziert überwiegend China, Türkei, Italien, Griechenland Vietnam. Regelmäßige Besuche Ort hohes Maß Übereinstimmung puncto Nachhaltigkeit gemeinsames Wertebewußtsein selbstverständlich. Die Erfolgsgeschichte Passport täglich weitergeschrieben - schließlich wächst Fangemeinde Mini unaufhörlich. The Fashion World's Mini Cooper Passport is one of the brands with authenticity their DNA, not simply known, but known to be coveted. Founded 1978 and located at its present base, Böblingen, since 1981, Passport is now regarded as one of the internationally most successful fashion brands the Contemporary Fashion segment. The company headquarters Böblingen employs about 50 people. Its modern, open architecture, heavy with glass and chrome, is characteristic of the brand and the makers behind it. Uncompromised perfectionism its design and love for detail its high quality features. A sense of aestheticism, style, and taste are creating inimitable atmosphere of modernity coupled with casual high feel good factor. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. He is complemented by kindred spirit, his wife Daniela Kromer-Gouder, who is responsible for the designs and adds stylish, feminine, ornamental side to the collection. New products appear on permanent basis to inspire ever more modern women all over the world and turn them into Passport aficionadas. Women who are life affirming, active, widely interested and well informed. These women know their own personal style and consciously seek modern mix of styles with matter-of-course appearance. Looks by Passport may surprise you, they may be cool or rock-‘n’-roll, but they are always casual and never forced. True to the motto of collection: contemporary, feminine and relaxed. What is it that sets Passport fashion apart? - A lot, for “upgrading” is company principle here. Value is generated not once, but twice. First by high performance product, since highest quality, perfect fit and sensational price-performance ratio are more than rule, they are actual reality. Then by the emotional appeal, the lifestyle and the attitude of our brand. Frank Gouder likes to compare Passport to the clever overall concept of the Mini Cooper. For the target group of the Mini, it is not the size of the vehicle that is decisive for the purchase, but its product substance and most of all its individuality and its premium image. The Mini clearly is icon. Frank Gouder sees Passport as similarly distinct its profile, clear it’s positioning with retailers, and unconditionally modern and innovative its brand staging. The collection shows clear-cut images, style distinct from that of its competitors, and it offers the customer the opportunity for high degree of identification. This is why, regard to distribution, Passport counts on close partnerships with leading retailers, as for instance Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck Munich, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen and Kastner & Öhler Graz. The brand staging is celebrated there – it is possible to present the Passport looks brand-compliant manner aimed at specific target groups. Increasing the quality of existing partnerships is high priority for Frank Gouder and his team, just as the acquisition of potentially interesting new dealers. A distribution via own stores is not planned at the moment, but virtual verticalization per online store is. Passport's high product performance is guaranteed by its long-standing cooperation with selected production facilities. Passport produces primarily China, Turkey, Italy, Greece, and Vietnam. Regular visits on site, just as extensive agreement on sustainability and common set of values, are understood. Passport's success story is still being written every day – after all, the fan community of the Mini Cooper continues to grow steadily. Passport Passport Shop ALLE ANZEIGEN Topseller Shirts Tops Strick Sweats Blusen Kleider & Röcke Hosen & Jeans Jacken & Mäntel Accessoires Modeberatung Trends Sale Passport Live Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco SPRING/SUMMER 2015 AUTUMN/WINTER 2015/16 SPRING/SUMMER 2016 Sie hier: Startseite Company Philosophie Company Kontakt Philosophie Key Facts Storefinder Showrooms Jobs & Karriere B2B-Shop Presse Philosophie Upgrading Unternehmensphilosophie Passport zählt erfolgreichsten femininen Modemarken Segment "Contemporary Fashion", weltweit über 1.000 Verkaufsstellen erhältlich überzeugt klares Profil, eindeutige Positionierung unverwechselbar eigenständige Handschrift Design. Eine etablierte Marke Passport evoziert positive Emotionen, starken Markenbindung, hohem Markenvertrauen großen Markenbegehrlichkeit einhergehen: Passport bekannt, begehrenswert. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Geschäftsführer Frank Gouder verknüpft. Frank Gouder 1989 Unternehmen Entwicklung Passport maßgeblich geprägt gesteuert: Als Architekt Visionär gleichermaßen definiert strategischen Eckpfeiler ganzheitlich orientierten Ausrichtung Unternehmen, Produkt Marke. Sein Credo: "Upgrading" Sinne Mehrwert Produkt Marke schaffen. Seine Vision: Passport ästhetisch stilistisch ausgereiften femininsten Kollektion europäischen Markt entwickeln. Sein Ziel: Perfektion Kollektionsarchitektur Markeninszenierung. Upgrading as Business Principle Passport counts amongst the most successful women's fashion brands the ‘Modern Woman’ mainstream segment and is available more than 1,000 points of sale worldwide. Passport has clear brand profile with unequivocal positioning and unmistakably unique signature design. An established brand like Passport evokes positive emotions that go along with strong brand loyalty, trust and – most of all – desirability. Passport is not simply known, it is desired. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. Architect as well as visionary, Frank Gouder specifies the strategic cornerstones of the holistic orientation of company, product, and brand. His credo: upgrading the sense of creating value through product and brand. His vision: to evolve Passport into the most feminine, stylistically perfected collection on the European market. His goal: to bring collection development and brand staging to perfection. Premium Economy für moderne, anspruchsvolle Frauen Passport bietet Mode. Die Looks Passport berühren verkörpern Lebensgefühl selbstbewussten, extrovertierten Frau. Sie unterliegt Diktat Mode. Sie lebt persönlichen Stil. Feminin farbenfroh. Aktiv informiert. Authentisch unangestrengt. Sie liebt alltagstaugliche Looks, Uhr funktionieren neu interpretieren individuell kombinieren kann. Die Kollektionsphilosophie Passport Eckpfeilern "contemporary, feminin, relaxt" entspricht Lebensgefühl perfekt. Bei Produkt Besondere, Eigenständige, sofort erkennbar. Daniela Kromer-Gouder forciert Stil, vermeintliche Brüche Kauf nimmt sogar bewusst inszeniert - Kleid mal coole rockige Lederjacke getragen werden. Dies Look spannend, begehrlich unverwechselbar. Passport Marke, versteht, zeitgemäßen Stil-Mix kreieren. Dabei wichtig: Liebe Detail höchster Anspruch Design, Qualität, Verarbeitung Passform. Eben Economy Preis Premium Produkt , Look Emotion. Premium Economy for Modern, Discerning Women Passport has more to offer than fashion. The looks of Passport strike chord and embody the way self-assured, extrovert woman looks at life. She is no fashion victim and is confident of personal style. A Passport woman ‘lives’ personal style - feminine and colourful, active and well-informed, authentic and easy-going. She loves styling that fits everyday use that works around the clock and can interpret and combine individually again and again. Passport's collection principles are their cornerstones “contemporary, feminine, relaxed” which perfectly fits this outlook on life. With every product, its uniqueness, its individuality can be easily seen. Daniela Kromer-Gouder is pushing style that accepts supposed inconsistencies, and even stages them on purpose – on occasion you may wear cool rocking leather jacket with your dress. This makes the look exciting, desirable unmistakable. Passport is brand that knows how to create contemporary mix of styles. Most important all that: love for detail and the highest demands on design, quality, and workmanship. Passport blends simple economic price architecture with the look and emotion of premium product. Passport bietet Mode. Die Looks Passport berühren verkörpern Lebensgefühl selbstbewussten, extrovertierten Frau. Sie unterliegt Diktat Mode. Sie lebt persönlichen Stil. Feminin farbenfroh. Aktiv informiert. Authentisch unangestrengt. Sie liebt alltagstaugliche Looks, Uhr funktionieren neu interpretieren individuell kombinieren kann. Passport Passport Shop ALLE ANZEIGEN Topseller Shirts Tops Strick Sweats Blusen Kleider & Röcke Hosen & Jeans Jacken & Mäntel Accessoires Modeberatung Trends Sale Passport Live Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco SPRING/SUMMER 2015 AUTUMN/WINTER 2015/16 SPRING/SUMMER 2016 Sie hier: Startseite Company Presse Company Kontakt Philosophie Key Facts Storefinder Showrooms Jobs & Karriere B2B-Shop Presse Presse Der Mini Cooper Modebranche Passport Marken, Echtes DNA haben, sind, Begehrlichkeit auslösen. Gegründet Jahr 1978 Anfang 1981 heutigen Standort Böblingen beheimatet, zählt Passport mittlerweile international erfolgreichsten Modemarken Bereich Contemporary Fashion. Am Firmensitz Böblingen arbeiten 50 Mitarbeiter. Charakteristisch für Marke Macher, stehen, moderne offene Architektur Glas Chrom. Kompromisslos perfektionistisch Design detailverliebt hochwertigen Ausstattung. Sinn für Ästhetik, Stil Geschmack schaffen einzigartige Atmosphäre Modernität, gepaart Lässigkeit hohem Wohlfühlcharakter. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Frank Gouder verknüpft, 1989 Unternehmen Geschäftsführer generelle Linie, Architektur Unternehmen, Marke Produkt vorgibt. Kongenial ergänzt Frau Daniela Kromer-Gouder, Design verantwortet geschmückte, feminine, dekorative Seite Kollektion einfließen lässt. Es entstehen permanent Produkte, moderne Frauen Welt begeistern Passport-Fans machen. Frauen, lebensfroh, aktiv, vielseitig interessiert informiert sind. Die Stil kennen bewusst modernen, selbstverständlich anmutenden Stil-Mix suchen. Looks Passport können überraschen, mal cool rockig, unkonstruiert lässig daher. Getreu Motto Kollektion: contemporary, feminin relaxt. Was Mode Passport auszeichnet? - Ziemlich viel, "Upgrading" Unternehmensphilosophie. Mehrwert doppelt generiert. Zum über Produkt hoher Performance, höchste Qualität, perfekte Passform sensationelles Preis-/Leistungs-Verhältnis Passport Maxime, gelebte Realität. Zum über Emotionalität, Lifestyle Lebensgefühl Marke. Frank Gouder vergleicht Passport gerne cleveren Gesamtkonzept Mini Coopers. Für Zielgruppe Minis Größe Fahrzeugs kaufentscheidend, Produktsubstanz Individualität Premium-Image. Der Mini klar Kult. Ähnlich geschärft Profil, klar Positionierung Fachhandel konsequent modern innovativ Markeninszenierung sieht Frank Gouder Passport. Die Kollektion bietet klare Images, grenzt stilistisch Mitbewerbern bietet Kundin hohes Maß Identifikation. In Vertriebsfragen setzt Passport intensive Partnerschaften führenden Fachhändlern, z.B. Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck München, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen Kastner & Öhler Graz. Hier Markeninszenierung zelebriert - Passport Looks können Markenkonform Zielgruppengenau präsentiert werden. Ein qualitativer Ausbau bestehenden Partnerschaften Akquise potentiell interessanten Händlern steht fest Agenda Frank Gouder Team. Eine Distribution über Stores derzeitig geplant. Wohl virtuelle Vertikalisierung über Online-Store. Ein Garant hohen Produktperformance Passport langjährige enge Zusammenarbeit ausgewählten Produktionsstätten. Passport produziert überwiegend China, Türkei, Italien, Griechenland Vietnam. Regelmäßige Besuche Ort hohes Maß Übereinstimmung puncto Nachhaltigkeit gemeinsames Wertebewußtsein selbstverständlich. Die Erfolgsgeschichte Passport täglich weitergeschrieben - schließlich wächst Fangemeinde Mini unaufhörlich. The Fashion World's Mini Cooper Passport is one of the brands with authenticity their DNA, not simply known, but known to be coveted. Founded 1978 and located at its present base, Böblingen, since 1981, Passport is now regarded as one of the internationally most successful fashion brands the Contemporary Fashion segment. The company headquarters Böblingen employs about 50 people. Its modern, open architecture, heavy with glass and chrome, is characteristic of the brand and the makers behind it. Uncompromised perfectionism its design and love for detail its high quality features. A sense of aestheticism, style, and taste are creating inimitable atmosphere of modernity coupled with casual high feel good factor. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. He is complemented by kindred spirit, his wife Daniela Kromer-Gouder, who is responsible for the designs and adds stylish, feminine, ornamental side to the collection. New products appear on permanent basis to inspire ever more modern women all over the world and turn them into Passport aficionadas. Women who are life affirming, active, widely interested and well informed. These women know their own personal style and consciously seek modern mix of styles with matter-of-course appearance. Looks by Passport may surprise you, they may be cool or rock-‘n’-roll, but they are always casual and never forced. True to the motto of collection: contemporary, feminine and relaxed. What is it that sets Passport fashion apart? - A lot, for “upgrading” is company principle here. Value is generated not once, but twice. First by high performance product, since highest quality, perfect fit and sensational price-performance ratio are more than rule, they are actual reality. Then by the emotional appeal, the lifestyle and the attitude of our brand. Frank Gouder likes to compare Passport to the clever overall concept of the Mini Cooper. For the target group of the Mini, it is not the size of the vehicle that is decisive for the purchase, but its product substance and most of all its individuality and its premium image. The Mini clearly is icon. Frank Gouder sees Passport as similarly distinct its profile, clear it’s positioning with retailers, and unconditionally modern and innovative its brand staging. The collection shows clear-cut images, style distinct from that of its competitors, and it offers the customer the opportunity for high degree of identification. This is why, regard to distribution, Passport counts on close partnerships with leading retailers, as for instance Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck Munich, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen and Kastner & Öhler Graz. The brand staging is celebrated there – it is possible to present the Passport looks brand-compliant manner aimed at specific target groups. Increasing the quality of existing partnerships is high priority for Frank Gouder and his team, just as the acquisition of potentially interesting new dealers. A distribution via own stores is not planned at the moment, but virtual verticalization per online store is. Passport's high product performance is guaranteed by its long-standing cooperation with selected production facilities. Passport produces primarily China, Turkey, Italy, Greece, and Vietnam. Regular visits on site, just as extensive agreement on sustainability and common set of values, are understood. Passport's success story is still being written every day – after all, the fan community of the Mini Cooper continues to grow steadily. Passport Passport Shop ALLE ANZEIGEN Topseller Shirts Tops Strick Sweats Blusen Kleider & Röcke Hosen & Jeans Jacken & Mäntel Accessoires Modeberatung Trends Sale Passport Live Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco SPRING/SUMMER 2015 AUTUMN/WINTER 2015/16 SPRING/SUMMER 2016 Sie hier: Startseite Company Philosophie Company Kontakt Philosophie Key Facts Storefinder Showrooms Jobs & Karriere B2B-Shop Presse Philosophie Upgrading Unternehmensphilosophie Passport zählt erfolgreichsten femininen Modemarken Segment "Contemporary Fashion", weltweit über 1.000 Verkaufsstellen erhältlich überzeugt klares Profil, eindeutige Positionierung unverwechselbar eigenständige Handschrift Design. Eine etablierte Marke Passport evoziert positive Emotionen, starken Markenbindung, hohem Markenvertrauen großen Markenbegehrlichkeit einhergehen: Passport bekannt, begehrenswert. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Geschäftsführer Frank Gouder verknüpft. Frank Gouder 1989 Unternehmen Entwicklung Passport maßgeblich geprägt gesteuert: Als Architekt Visionär gleichermaßen definiert strategischen Eckpfeiler ganzheitlich orientierten Ausrichtung Unternehmen, Produkt Marke. Sein Credo: "Upgrading" Sinne Mehrwert Produkt Marke schaffen. Seine Vision: Passport ästhetisch stilistisch ausgereiften femininsten Kollektion europäischen Markt entwickeln. Sein Ziel: Perfektion Kollektionsarchitektur Markeninszenierung. Upgrading as Business Principle Passport counts amongst the most successful women's fashion brands the ‘Modern Woman’ mainstream segment and is available more than 1,000 points of sale worldwide. Passport has clear brand profile with unequivocal positioning and unmistakably unique signature design. An established brand like Passport evokes positive emotions that go along with strong brand loyalty, trust and – most of all – desirability. Passport is not simply known, it is desired. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. Architect as well as visionary, Frank Gouder specifies the strategic cornerstones of the holistic orientation of company, product, and brand. His credo: upgrading the sense of creating value through product and brand. His vision: to evolve Passport into the most feminine, stylistically perfected collection on the European market. His goal: to bring collection development and brand staging to perfection. Premium Economy für moderne, anspruchsvolle Frauen Passport bietet Mode. Die Looks Passport berühren verkörpern Lebensgefühl selbstbewussten, extrovertierten Frau. Sie unterliegt Diktat Mode. Sie lebt persönlichen Stil. Feminin farbenfroh. Aktiv informiert. Authentisch unangestrengt. Sie liebt alltagstaugliche Looks, Uhr funktionieren neu interpretieren individuell kombinieren kann. Die Kollektionsphilosophie Passport Eckpfeilern "contemporary, feminin, relaxt" entspricht Lebensgefühl perfekt. Bei Produkt Besondere, Eigenständige, sofort erkennbar. Daniela Kromer-Gouder forciert Stil, vermeintliche Brüche Kauf nimmt sogar bewusst inszeniert - Kleid mal coole rockige Lederjacke getragen werden. Dies Look spannend, begehrlich unverwechselbar. Passport Marke, versteht, zeitgemäßen Stil-Mix kreieren. Dabei wichtig: Liebe Detail höchster Anspruch Design, Qualität, Verarbeitung Passform. Eben Economy Preis Premium Produkt , Look Emotion. Premium Economy for Modern, Discerning Women Passport has more to offer than fashion. The looks of Passport strike chord and embody the way self-assured, extrovert woman looks at life. She is no fashion victim and is confident of personal style. A Passport woman ‘lives’ personal style - feminine and colourful, active and well-informed, authentic and easy-going. She loves styling that fits everyday use that works around the clock and can interpret and combine individually again and again. Passport's collection principles are their cornerstones “contemporary, feminine, relaxed” which perfectly fits this outlook on life. With every product, its uniqueness, its individuality can be easily seen. Daniela Kromer-Gouder is pushing style that accepts supposed inconsistencies, and even stages them on purpose – on occasion you may wear cool rocking leather jacket with your dress. This makes the look exciting, desirable unmistakable. Passport is brand that knows how to create contemporary mix of styles. Most important all that: love for detail and the highest demands on design, quality, and workmanship. Passport blends simple economic price architecture with the look and emotion of premium product. Passport bietet Mode. Die Looks Passport berühren verkörpern Lebensgefühl selbstbewussten, extrovertierten Frau. Sie unterliegt Diktat Mode. Sie lebt persönlichen Stil. Feminin farbenfroh. Aktiv informiert. Authentisch unangestrengt. Sie liebt alltagstaugliche Looks, Uhr funktionieren neu interpretieren individuell kombinieren kann. Mehr erfahren Figurguide: O-Typ Der O-Typ schmale Beine rundlichen Oberkörper. Die breiteste Stelle Taillen-Bereich. Aber schöne Oberweite typisch für ihn. Mehr erfahren Figurguide: V-Typ Der V-Typ sportlichen Oberkörper ausgeprägten, muskulösen Schultern Oberarmen. Die Hüfte Beine hingegen schmal. Mehr erfahren Figurguide: X-Typ Der X-Typ ausgewogene Sanduhr-Silhouette. Schultern Hüfte breit. Die schmalste Stelle Taille. Passport Passport Shop ALLE ANZEIGEN Topseller Shirts Tops Strick Sweats Blusen Kleider & Röcke Hosen & Jeans Jacken & Mäntel Accessoires Modeberatung Trends Sale Passport Live Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco SPRING/SUMMER 2015 AUTUMN/WINTER 2015/16 SPRING/SUMMER 2016 Sie hier: Startseite Company Presse Company Kontakt Philosophie Key Facts Storefinder Showrooms Jobs & Karriere B2B-Shop Presse Presse Der Mini Cooper Modebranche Passport Marken, Echtes DNA haben, sind, Begehrlichkeit auslösen. Gegründet Jahr 1978 Anfang 1981 heutigen Standort Böblingen beheimatet, zählt Passport mittlerweile international erfolgreichsten Modemarken Bereich Contemporary Fashion. Am Firmensitz Böblingen arbeiten 50 Mitarbeiter. Charakteristisch für Marke Macher, stehen, moderne offene Architektur Glas Chrom. Kompromisslos perfektionistisch Design detailverliebt hochwertigen Ausstattung. Sinn für Ästhetik, Stil Geschmack schaffen einzigartige Atmosphäre Modernität, gepaart Lässigkeit hohem Wohlfühlcharakter. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Frank Gouder verknüpft, 1989 Unternehmen Geschäftsführer generelle Linie, Architektur Unternehmen, Marke Produkt vorgibt. Kongenial ergänzt Frau Daniela Kromer-Gouder, Design verantwortet geschmückte, feminine, dekorative Seite Kollektion einfließen lässt. Es entstehen permanent Produkte, moderne Frauen Welt begeistern Passport-Fans machen. Frauen, lebensfroh, aktiv, vielseitig interessiert informiert sind. Die Stil kennen bewusst modernen, selbstverständlich anmutenden Stil-Mix suchen. Looks Passport können überraschen, mal cool rockig, unkonstruiert lässig daher. Getreu Motto Kollektion: contemporary, feminin relaxt. Was Mode Passport auszeichnet? - Ziemlich viel, "Upgrading" Unternehmensphilosophie. Mehrwert doppelt generiert. Zum über Produkt hoher Performance, höchste Qualität, perfekte Passform sensationelles Preis-/Leistungs-Verhältnis Passport Maxime, gelebte Realität. Zum über Emotionalität, Lifestyle Lebensgefühl Marke. Frank Gouder vergleicht Passport gerne cleveren Gesamtkonzept Mini Coopers. Für Zielgruppe Minis Größe Fahrzeugs kaufentscheidend, Produktsubstanz Individualität Premium-Image. Der Mini klar Kult. Ähnlich geschärft Profil, klar Positionierung Fachhandel konsequent modern innovativ Markeninszenierung sieht Frank Gouder Passport. Die Kollektion bietet klare Images, grenzt stilistisch Mitbewerbern bietet Kundin hohes Maß Identifikation. In Vertriebsfragen setzt Passport intensive Partnerschaften führenden Fachhändlern, z.B. Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck München, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen Kastner & Öhler Graz. Hier Markeninszenierung zelebriert - Passport Looks können Markenkonform Zielgruppengenau präsentiert werden. Ein qualitativer Ausbau bestehenden Partnerschaften Akquise potentiell interessanten Händlern steht fest Agenda Frank Gouder Team. Eine Distribution über Stores derzeitig geplant. Wohl virtuelle Vertikalisierung über Online-Store. Ein Garant hohen Produktperformance Passport langjährige enge Zusammenarbeit ausgewählten Produktionsstätten. Passport produziert überwiegend China, Türkei, Italien, Griechenland Vietnam. Regelmäßige Besuche Ort hohes Maß Übereinstimmung puncto Nachhaltigkeit gemeinsames Wertebewußtsein selbstverständlich. Die Erfolgsgeschichte Passport täglich weitergeschrieben - schließlich wächst Fangemeinde Mini unaufhörlich. The Fashion World's Mini Cooper Passport is one of the brands with authenticity their DNA, not simply known, but known to be coveted. Founded 1978 and located at its present base, Böblingen, since 1981, Passport is now regarded as one of the internationally most successful fashion brands the Contemporary Fashion segment. The company headquarters Böblingen employs about 50 people. Its modern, open architecture, heavy with glass and chrome, is characteristic of the brand and the makers behind it. Uncompromised perfectionism its design and love for detail its high quality features. A sense of aestheticism, style, and taste are creating inimitable atmosphere of modernity coupled with casual high feel good factor. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. He is complemented by kindred spirit, his wife Daniela Kromer-Gouder, who is responsible for the designs and adds stylish, feminine, ornamental side to the collection. New products appear on permanent basis to inspire ever more modern women all over the world and turn them into Passport aficionadas. Women who are life affirming, active, widely interested and well informed. These women know their own personal style and consciously seek modern mix of styles with matter-of-course appearance. Looks by Passport may surprise you, they may be cool or rock-‘n’-roll, but they are always casual and never forced. True to the motto of collection: contemporary, feminine and relaxed. What is it that sets Passport fashion apart? - A lot, for “upgrading” is company principle here. Value is generated not once, but twice. First by high performance product, since highest quality, perfect fit and sensational price-performance ratio are more than rule, they are actual reality. Then by the emotional appeal, the lifestyle and the attitude of our brand. Frank Gouder likes to compare Passport to the clever overall concept of the Mini Cooper. For the target group of the Mini, it is not the size of the vehicle that is decisive for the purchase, but its product substance and most of all its individuality and its premium image. The Mini clearly is icon. Frank Gouder sees Passport as similarly distinct its profile, clear it’s positioning with retailers, and unconditionally modern and innovative its brand staging. The collection shows clear-cut images, style distinct from that of its competitors, and it offers the customer the opportunity for high degree of identification. This is why, regard to distribution, Passport counts on close partnerships with leading retailers, as for instance Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck Munich, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen and Kastner & Öhler Graz. The brand staging is celebrated there – it is possible to present the Passport looks brand-compliant manner aimed at specific target groups. Increasing the quality of existing partnerships is high priority for Frank Gouder and his team, just as the acquisition of potentially interesting new dealers. A distribution via own stores is not planned at the moment, but virtual verticalization per online store is. Passport's high product performance is guaranteed by its long-standing cooperation with selected production facilities. Passport produces primarily China, Turkey, Italy, Greece, and Vietnam. Regular visits on site, just as extensive agreement on sustainability and common set of values, are understood. Passport's success story is still being written every day – after all, the fan community of the Mini Cooper continues to grow steadily. Passport Passport Shop ALLE ANZEIGEN Topseller Shirts Tops Strick Sweats Blusen Kleider & Röcke Hosen & Jeans Jacken & Mäntel Accessoires Modeberatung Trends Sale Passport Live Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco SPRING/SUMMER 2015 AUTUMN/WINTER 2015/16 SPRING/SUMMER 2016 Sie hier: Startseite Company Philosophie Company Kontakt Philosophie Key Facts Storefinder Showrooms Jobs & Karriere B2B-Shop Presse Philosophie Upgrading Unternehmensphilosophie Passport zählt erfolgreichsten femininen Modemarken Segment "Contemporary Fashion", weltweit über 1.000 Verkaufsstellen erhältlich überzeugt klares Profil, eindeutige Positionierung unverwechselbar eigenständige Handschrift Design. Eine etablierte Marke Passport evoziert positive Emotionen, starken Markenbindung, hohem Markenvertrauen großen Markenbegehrlichkeit einhergehen: Passport bekannt, begehrenswert. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Geschäftsführer Frank Gouder verknüpft. Frank Gouder 1989 Unternehmen Entwicklung Passport maßgeblich geprägt gesteuert: Als Architekt Visionär gleichermaßen definiert strategischen Eckpfeiler ganzheitlich orientierten Ausrichtung Unternehmen, Produkt Marke. Sein Credo: "Upgrading" Sinne Mehrwert Produkt Marke schaffen. Seine Vision: Passport ästhetisch stilistisch ausgereiften femininsten Kollektion europäischen Markt entwickeln. Sein Ziel: Perfektion Kollektionsarchitektur Markeninszenierung. Upgrading as Business Principle Passport counts amongst the most successful women's fashion brands the ‘Modern Woman’ mainstream segment and is available more than 1,000 points of sale worldwide. Passport has clear brand profile with unequivocal positioning and unmistakably unique signature design. An established brand like Passport evokes positive emotions that go along with strong brand loyalty, trust and – most of all – desirability. Passport is not simply known, it is desired. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. Architect as well as visionary, Frank Gouder specifies the strategic cornerstones of the holistic orientation of company, product, and brand. His credo: upgrading the sense of creating value through product and brand. His vision: to evolve Passport into the most feminine, stylistically perfected collection on the European market. His goal: to bring collection development and brand staging to perfection. Premium Economy für moderne, anspruchsvolle Frauen Passport bietet Mode. Die Looks Passport berühren verkörpern Lebensgefühl selbstbewussten, extrovertierten Frau. Sie unterliegt Diktat Mode. Sie lebt persönlichen Stil. Feminin farbenfroh. Aktiv informiert. Authentisch unangestrengt. Sie liebt alltagstaugliche Looks, Uhr funktionieren neu interpretieren individuell kombinieren kann. Die Kollektionsphilosophie Passport Eckpfeilern "contemporary, feminin, relaxt" entspricht Lebensgefühl perfekt. Bei Produkt Besondere, Eigenständige, sofort erkennbar. Daniela Kromer-Gouder forciert Stil, vermeintliche Brüche Kauf nimmt sogar bewusst inszeniert - Kleid mal coole rockige Lederjacke getragen werden. Dies Look spannend, begehrlich unverwechselbar. Passport Marke, versteht, zeitgemäßen Stil-Mix kreieren. Dabei wichtig: Liebe Detail höchster Anspruch Design, Qualität, Verarbeitung Passform. Eben Economy Preis Premium Produkt , Look Emotion. Premium Economy for Modern, Discerning Women Passport has more to offer than fashion. The looks of Passport strike chord and embody the way self-assured, extrovert woman looks at life. She is no fashion victim and is confident of personal style. A Passport woman ‘lives’ personal style - feminine and colourful, active and well-informed, authentic and easy-going. She loves styling that fits everyday use that works around the clock and can interpret and combine individually again and again. Passport's collection principles are their cornerstones “contemporary, feminine, relaxed” which perfectly fits this outlook on life. With every product, its uniqueness, its individuality can be easily seen. Daniela Kromer-Gouder is pushing style that accepts supposed inconsistencies, and even stages them on purpose – on occasion you may wear cool rocking leather jacket with your dress. This makes the look exciting, desirable unmistakable. Passport is brand that knows how to create contemporary mix of styles. Most important all that: love for detail and the highest demands on design, quality, and workmanship. Passport blends simple economic price architecture with the look and emotion of premium product. Passport bietet Mode. Die Looks Passport berühren verkörpern Lebensgefühl selbstbewussten, extrovertierten Frau. Sie unterliegt Diktat Mode. Sie lebt persönlichen Stil. Feminin farbenfroh. Aktiv informiert. Authentisch unangestrengt. Sie liebt alltagstaugliche Looks, Uhr funktionieren neu interpretieren individuell kombinieren kann. Passport Passport Shop ALLE ANZEIGEN Topseller Shirts Tops Strick Sweats Blusen Kleider & Röcke Hosen & Jeans Jacken & Mäntel Accessoires Modeberatung Trends Sale Passport Live Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco SPRING/SUMMER 2015 AUTUMN/WINTER 2015/16 SPRING/SUMMER 2016 Sie hier: Startseite Company Presse Company Kontakt Philosophie Key Facts Storefinder Showrooms Jobs & Karriere B2B-Shop Presse Presse Der Mini Cooper Modebranche Passport Marken, Echtes DNA haben, sind, Begehrlichkeit auslösen. Gegründet Jahr 1978 Anfang 1981 heutigen Standort Böblingen beheimatet, zählt Passport mittlerweile international erfolgreichsten Modemarken Bereich Contemporary Fashion. Am Firmensitz Böblingen arbeiten 50 Mitarbeiter. Charakteristisch für Marke Macher, stehen, moderne offene Architektur Glas Chrom. Kompromisslos perfektionistisch Design detailverliebt hochwertigen Ausstattung. Sinn für Ästhetik, Stil Geschmack schaffen einzigartige Atmosphäre Modernität, gepaart Lässigkeit hohem Wohlfühlcharakter. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Frank Gouder verknüpft, 1989 Unternehmen Geschäftsführer generelle Linie, Architektur Unternehmen, Marke Produkt vorgibt. Kongenial ergänzt Frau Daniela Kromer-Gouder, Design verantwortet geschmückte, feminine, dekorative Seite Kollektion einfließen lässt. Es entstehen permanent Produkte, moderne Frauen Welt begeistern Passport-Fans machen. Frauen, lebensfroh, aktiv, vielseitig interessiert informiert sind. Die Stil kennen bewusst modernen, selbstverständlich anmutenden Stil-Mix suchen. Looks Passport können überraschen, mal cool rockig, unkonstruiert lässig daher. Getreu Motto Kollektion: contemporary, feminin relaxt. Was Mode Passport auszeichnet? - Ziemlich viel, "Upgrading" Unternehmensphilosophie. Mehrwert doppelt generiert. Zum über Produkt hoher Performance, höchste Qualität, perfekte Passform sensationelles Preis-/Leistungs-Verhältnis Passport Maxime, gelebte Realität. Zum über Emotionalität, Lifestyle Lebensgefühl Marke. Frank Gouder vergleicht Passport gerne cleveren Gesamtkonzept Mini Coopers. Für Zielgruppe Minis Größe Fahrzeugs kaufentscheidend, Produktsubstanz Individualität Premium-Image. Der Mini klar Kult. Ähnlich geschärft Profil, klar Positionierung Fachhandel konsequent modern innovativ Markeninszenierung sieht Frank Gouder Passport. Die Kollektion bietet klare Images, grenzt stilistisch Mitbewerbern bietet Kundin hohes Maß Identifikation. In Vertriebsfragen setzt Passport intensive Partnerschaften führenden Fachhändlern, z.B. Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck München, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen Kastner & Öhler Graz. Hier Markeninszenierung zelebriert - Passport Looks können Markenkonform Zielgruppengenau präsentiert werden. Ein qualitativer Ausbau bestehenden Partnerschaften Akquise potentiell interessanten Händlern steht fest Agenda Frank Gouder Team. Eine Distribution über Stores derzeitig geplant. Wohl virtuelle Vertikalisierung über Online-Store. Ein Garant hohen Produktperformance Passport langjährige enge Zusammenarbeit ausgewählten Produktionsstätten. Passport produziert überwiegend China, Türkei, Italien, Griechenland Vietnam. Regelmäßige Besuche Ort hohes Maß Übereinstimmung puncto Nachhaltigkeit gemeinsames Wertebewußtsein selbstverständlich. Die Erfolgsgeschichte Passport täglich weitergeschrieben - schließlich wächst Fangemeinde Mini unaufhörlich. The Fashion World's Mini Cooper Passport is one of the brands with authenticity their DNA, not simply known, but known to be coveted. Founded 1978 and located at its present base, Böblingen, since 1981, Passport is now regarded as one of the internationally most successful fashion brands the Contemporary Fashion segment. The company headquarters Böblingen employs about 50 people. Its modern, open architecture, heavy with glass and chrome, is characteristic of the brand and the makers behind it. Uncompromised perfectionism its design and love for detail its high quality features. A sense of aestheticism, style, and taste are creating inimitable atmosphere of modernity coupled with casual high feel good factor. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. He is complemented by kindred spirit, his wife Daniela Kromer-Gouder, who is responsible for the designs and adds stylish, feminine, ornamental side to the collection. New products appear on permanent basis to inspire ever more modern women all over the world and turn them into Passport aficionadas. Women who are life affirming, active, widely interested and well informed. These women know their own personal style and consciously seek modern mix of styles with matter-of-course appearance. Looks by Passport may surprise you, they may be cool or rock-‘n’-roll, but they are always casual and never forced. True to the motto of collection: contemporary, feminine and relaxed. What is it that sets Passport fashion apart? - A lot, for “upgrading” is company principle here. Value is generated not once, but twice. First by high performance product, since highest quality, perfect fit and sensational price-performance ratio are more than rule, they are actual reality. Then by the emotional appeal, the lifestyle and the attitude of our brand. Frank Gouder likes to compare Passport to the clever overall concept of the Mini Cooper. For the target group of the Mini, it is not the size of the vehicle that is decisive for the purchase, but its product substance and most of all its individuality and its premium image. The Mini clearly is icon. Frank Gouder sees Passport as similarly distinct its profile, clear it’s positioning with retailers, and unconditionally modern and innovative its brand staging. The collection shows clear-cut images, style distinct from that of its competitors, and it offers the customer the opportunity for high degree of identification. This is why, regard to distribution, Passport counts on close partnerships with leading retailers, as for instance Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck Munich, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen and Kastner & Öhler Graz. The brand staging is celebrated there – it is possible to present the Passport looks brand-compliant manner aimed at specific target groups. Increasing the quality of existing partnerships is high priority for Frank Gouder and his team, just as the acquisition of potentially interesting new dealers. A distribution via own stores is not planned at the moment, but virtual verticalization per online store is. Passport's high product performance is guaranteed by its long-standing cooperation with selected production facilities. Passport produces primarily China, Turkey, Italy, Greece, and Vietnam. Regular visits on site, just as extensive agreement on sustainability and common set of values, are understood. Passport's success story is still being written every day – after all, the fan community of the Mini Cooper continues to grow steadily. Passport Passport Shop ALLE ANZEIGEN Topseller Shirts Tops Strick Sweats Blusen Kleider & Röcke Hosen & Jeans Jacken & Mäntel Accessoires Modeberatung Trends Sale Passport Live Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco SPRING/SUMMER 2015 AUTUMN/WINTER 2015/16 SPRING/SUMMER 2016 Sie hier: Startseite Company Philosophie Company Kontakt Philosophie Key Facts Storefinder Showrooms Jobs & Karriere B2B-Shop Presse Philosophie Upgrading Unternehmensphilosophie Passport zählt erfolgreichsten femininen Modemarken Segment "Contemporary Fashion", weltweit über 1.000 Verkaufsstellen erhältlich überzeugt klares Profil, eindeutige Positionierung unverwechselbar eigenständige Handschrift Design. Eine etablierte Marke Passport evoziert positive Emotionen, starken Markenbindung, hohem Markenvertrauen großen Markenbegehrlichkeit einhergehen: Passport bekannt, begehrenswert. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Geschäftsführer Frank Gouder verknüpft. Frank Gouder 1989 Unternehmen Entwicklung Passport maßgeblich geprägt gesteuert: Als Architekt Visionär gleichermaßen definiert strategischen Eckpfeiler ganzheitlich orientierten Ausrichtung Unternehmen, Produkt Marke. Sein Credo: "Upgrading" Sinne Mehrwert Produkt Marke schaffen. Seine Vision: Passport ästhetisch stilistisch ausgereiften femininsten Kollektion europäischen Markt entwickeln. Sein Ziel: Perfektion Kollektionsarchitektur Markeninszenierung. Upgrading as Business Principle Passport counts amongst the most successful women's fashion brands the ‘Modern Woman’ mainstream segment and is available more than 1,000 points of sale worldwide. Passport has clear brand profile with unequivocal positioning and unmistakably unique signature design. An established brand like Passport evokes positive emotions that go along with strong brand loyalty, trust and – most of all – desirability. Passport is not simply known, it is desired. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. Architect as well as visionary, Frank Gouder specifies the strategic cornerstones of the holistic orientation of company, product, and brand. His credo: upgrading the sense of creating value through product and brand. His vision: to evolve Passport into the most feminine, stylistically perfected collection on the European market. His goal: to bring collection development and brand staging to perfection. Premium Economy für moderne, anspruchsvolle Frauen Passport bietet Mode. Die Looks Passport berühren verkörpern Lebensgefühl selbstbewussten, extrovertierten Frau. Sie unterliegt Diktat Mode. Sie lebt persönlichen Stil. Feminin farbenfroh. Aktiv informiert. Authentisch unangestrengt. Sie liebt alltagstaugliche Looks, Uhr funktionieren neu interpretieren individuell kombinieren kann. Die Kollektionsphilosophie Passport Eckpfeilern "contemporary, feminin, relaxt" entspricht Lebensgefühl perfekt. Bei Produkt Besondere, Eigenständige, sofort erkennbar. Daniela Kromer-Gouder forciert Stil, vermeintliche Brüche Kauf nimmt sogar bewusst inszeniert - Kleid mal coole rockige Lederjacke getragen werden. Dies Look spannend, begehrlich unverwechselbar. Passport Marke, versteht, zeitgemäßen Stil-Mix kreieren. Dabei wichtig: Liebe Detail höchster Anspruch Design, Qualität, Verarbeitung Passform. Eben Economy Preis Premium Produkt , Look Emotion. Premium Economy for Modern, Discerning Women Passport has more to offer than fashion. The looks of Passport strike chord and embody the way self-assured, extrovert woman looks at life. She is no fashion victim and is confident of personal style. A Passport woman ‘lives’ personal style - feminine and colourful, active and well-informed, authentic and easy-going. She loves styling that fits everyday use that works around the clock and can interpret and combine individually again and again. Passport's collection principles are their cornerstones “contemporary, feminine, relaxed” which perfectly fits this outlook on life. With every product, its uniqueness, its individuality can be easily seen. Daniela Kromer-Gouder is pushing style that accepts supposed inconsistencies, and even stages them on purpose – on occasion you may wear cool rocking leather jacket with your dress. This makes the look exciting, desirable unmistakable. Passport is brand that knows how to create contemporary mix of styles. Most important all that: love for detail and the highest demands on design, quality, and workmanship. Passport blends simple economic price architecture with the look and emotion of premium product. Gegründet Jahr 1978 Anfang 1981 heutigen Standort Böblingen beheimatet, zählt Passport mittlerweile international erfolgreichsten Modemarken Bereich Contemporary Fashion. Am Firmensitz Böblingen arbeiten 50 Mitarbeiter. Charakteristisch für Marke Macher, stehen, moderne offene Architektur Glas Chrom. Kompromisslos perfektionistisch Design detailverliebt hochwertigen Ausstattung. Sinn für Ästhetik, Stil Geschmack schaffen einzigartige Atmosphäre Modernität, gepaart Lässigkeit hohem Wohlfühlcharakter. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Frank Gouder verknüpft, 1989 Unternehmen Geschäftsführer generelle Linie, Architektur Unternehmen, Marke Produkt vorgibt. Kongenial ergänzt Frau Daniela Kromer-Gouder, Design verantwortet geschmückte, feminine, dekorative Seite Kollektion einfließen lässt. Es entstehen permanent Produkte, moderne Frauen Welt begeistern Passport-Fans machen. Frauen, lebensfroh, aktiv, vielseitig interessiert informiert sind. Die Stil kennen bewusst modernen, selbstverständlich anmutenden Stil-Mix suchen. Looks Passport können überraschen, mal cool rockig, unkonstruiert lässig daher. Getreu Motto Kollektion: contemporary, feminin relaxt. Was Mode Passport auszeichnet? - Ziemlich viel, "Upgrading" Unternehmensphilosophie. Mehrwert doppelt generiert. Zum über Produkt hoher Performance, höchste Qualität, perfekte Passform sensationelles Preis-/Leistungs-Verhältnis Passport Maxime, gelebte Realität. Zum über Emotionalität, Lifestyle Lebensgefühl Marke. Frank Gouder vergleicht Passport gerne cleveren Gesamtkonzept Mini Coopers. Für Zielgruppe Minis Größe Fahrzeugs kaufentscheidend, Produktsubstanz Individualität Premium-Image. Der Mini klar Kult. Ähnlich geschärft Profil, klar Positionierung Fachhandel konsequent modern innovativ Markeninszenierung sieht Frank Gouder Passport. Die Kollektion bietet klare Images, grenzt stilistisch Mitbewerbern bietet Kundin hohes Maß Identifikation. In Vertriebsfragen setzt Passport intensive Partnerschaften führenden Fachhändlern, z.B. Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck München, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen Kastner & Öhler Graz. Hier Markeninszenierung zelebriert - Passport Looks können Markenkonform Zielgruppengenau präsentiert werden. Ein qualitativer Ausbau bestehenden Partnerschaften Akquise potentiell interessanten Händlern steht fest Agenda Frank Gouder Team. Eine Distribution über Stores derzeitig geplant. Wohl virtuelle Vertikalisierung über Online-Store. Ein Garant hohen Produktperformance Passport langjährige enge Zusammenarbeit ausgewählten Produktionsstätten. Passport produziert überwiegend China, Türkei, Italien, Griechenland Vietnam. Regelmäßige Besuche Ort hohes Maß Übereinstimmung puncto Nachhaltigkeit gemeinsames Wertebewußtsein selbstverständlich. Die Erfolgsgeschichte Passport täglich weitergeschrieben - schließlich wächst Fangemeinde Mini unaufhörlich. The Fashion World's Mini Cooper Passport is one of the brands with authenticity their DNA, not simply known, but known to be coveted. Founded 1978 and located at its present base, Böblingen, since 1981, Passport is now regarded as one of the internationally most successful fashion brands the Contemporary Fashion segment. The company headquarters Böblingen employs about 50 people. Its modern, open architecture, heavy with glass and chrome, is characteristic of the brand and the makers behind it. Uncompromised perfectionism its design and love for detail its high quality features. A sense of aestheticism, style, and taste are creating inimitable atmosphere of modernity coupled with casual high feel good factor. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. He is complemented by kindred spirit, his wife Daniela Kromer-Gouder, who is responsible for the designs and adds stylish, feminine, ornamental side to the collection. New products appear on permanent basis to inspire ever more modern women all over the world and turn them into Passport aficionadas. Women who are life affirming, active, widely interested and well informed. These women know their own personal style and consciously seek modern mix of styles with matter-of-course appearance. Looks by Passport may surprise you, they may be cool or rock-‘n’-roll, but they are always casual and never forced. True to the motto of collection: contemporary, feminine and relaxed. What is it that sets Passport fashion apart? - A lot, for “upgrading” is company principle here. Value is generated not once, but twice. First by high performance product, since highest quality, perfect fit and sensational price-performance ratio are more than rule, they are actual reality. Then by the emotional appeal, the lifestyle and the attitude of our brand. Frank Gouder likes to compare Passport to the clever overall concept of the Mini Cooper. For the target group of the Mini, it is not the size of the vehicle that is decisive for the purchase, but its product substance and most of all its individuality and its premium image. The Mini clearly is icon. Frank Gouder sees Passport as similarly distinct its profile, clear it’s positioning with retailers, and unconditionally modern and innovative its brand staging. The collection shows clear-cut images, style distinct from that of its competitors, and it offers the customer the opportunity for high degree of identification. This is why, regard to distribution, Passport counts on close partnerships with leading retailers, as for instance Engelhorn Mannheim, Beck Munich, Kaiser Freiburg, L+T Osnabrück, Garhammer Waldkirchen and Kastner & Öhler Graz. The brand staging is celebrated there – it is possible to present the Passport looks brand-compliant manner aimed at specific target groups. Increasing the quality of existing partnerships is high priority for Frank Gouder and his team, just as the acquisition of potentially interesting new dealers. A distribution via own stores is not planned at the moment, but virtual verticalization per online store is. Passport's high product performance is guaranteed by its long-standing cooperation with selected production facilities. Passport produces primarily China, Turkey, Italy, Greece, and Vietnam. Regular visits on site, just as extensive agreement on sustainability and common set of values, are understood. Passport's success story is still being written every day – after all, the fan community of the Mini Cooper continues to grow steadily. Passport Passport Shop ALLE ANZEIGEN Topseller Shirts Tops Strick Sweats Blusen Kleider & Röcke Hosen & Jeans Jacken & Mäntel Accessoires Modeberatung Trends Sale Passport Live Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco Maritime Looks Welcome to Acapulco SPRING/SUMMER 2015 AUTUMN/WINTER 2015/16 SPRING/SUMMER 2016 Sie hier: Startseite Company Philosophie Company Kontakt Philosophie Key Facts Storefinder Showrooms Jobs & Karriere B2B-Shop Presse Philosophie Upgrading Unternehmensphilosophie Passport zählt erfolgreichsten femininen Modemarken Segment "Contemporary Fashion", weltweit über 1.000 Verkaufsstellen erhältlich überzeugt klares Profil, eindeutige Positionierung unverwechselbar eigenständige Handschrift Design. Eine etablierte Marke Passport evoziert positive Emotionen, starken Markenbindung, hohem Markenvertrauen großen Markenbegehrlichkeit einhergehen: Passport bekannt, begehrenswert. Die Geschichte Passport eng Person Persönlichkeit Geschäftsführer Frank Gouder verknüpft. Frank Gouder 1989 Unternehmen Entwicklung Passport maßgeblich geprägt gesteuert: Als Architekt Visionär gleichermaßen definiert strategischen Eckpfeiler ganzheitlich orientierten Ausrichtung Unternehmen, Produkt Marke. Sein Credo: "Upgrading" Sinne Mehrwert Produkt Marke schaffen. Seine Vision: Passport ästhetisch stilistisch ausgereiften femininsten Kollektion europäischen Markt entwickeln. Sein Ziel: Perfektion Kollektionsarchitektur Markeninszenierung. Upgrading as Business Principle Passport counts amongst the most successful women's fashion brands the ‘Modern Woman’ mainstream segment and is available more than 1,000 points of sale worldwide. Passport has clear brand profile with unequivocal positioning and unmistakably unique signature design. An established brand like Passport evokes positive emotions that go along with strong brand loyalty, trust and – most of all – desirability. Passport is not simply known, it is desired. The history of Passport is intimately linked with the person and personality of Frank Gouder, who has been with the firm since 1989 and, as its managing director, determines the companies general direction, the structure of business, brand, and product. Architect as well as visionary, Frank Gouder specifies the strategic cornerstones of the holistic orientation of company, product, and brand. His credo: upgrading the sense of creating value through product and brand. His vision: to evolve Passport into the most feminine, stylistically perfected collection on the European market. His goal: to bring collection development and brand staging to perfection. Premium Economy für moderne, anspruchsvolle Frauen Passport bietet Mode. Die Looks Passport berühren verkörpern Lebensgefühl selbstbewussten, extrovertierten Frau. Sie unterliegt Diktat Mode. Sie lebt persönlichen Stil. Feminin farbenfroh. Aktiv informiert. Authentisch unangestrengt. Sie liebt alltagstaugliche Looks, Uhr funktionieren neu interpretieren individuell kombinieren kann. Die Kollektionsphilosophie Passport Eckpfeilern "contemporary, feminin, relaxt" entspricht Lebensgefühl perfekt. Bei Produkt Besondere, Eigenständige, sofort erkennbar. Daniela Kromer-Gouder forciert Stil, vermeintliche Brüche Kauf nimmt sogar bewusst inszeniert - Kleid mal coole rockige Lederjacke getragen werden. Dies Look spannend, begehrlich unverwechselbar. Passport Marke, versteht, zeitgemäßen Stil-Mix kreieren. Dabei wichtig: Liebe Detail höchster Anspruch Design, Qualität, Verarbeitung Passform. Eben Economy Preis Premium Produkt , Look Emotion. Premium Economy for Modern, Discerning Women Passport has more to offer than fashion. The looks of Passport strike chord and embody the way self-assured, extrovert woman looks at life. She is no fashion victim and is confident of personal style. A Passport woman ‘lives’ personal style - feminine and colourful, active and well-informed, authentic and easy-going. She loves styling that fits everyday use that works around the clock and can interpret and combine individually again and again. Passport's collection principles are their cornerstones “contemporary, feminine, relaxed” which perfectly fits this outlook on life. With every product, its uniqueness, its individuality can be easily seen. Daniela Kromer-Gouder is pushing style that accepts supposed inconsistencies, and even stages them on purpose – on occasion you may wear cool rocking leather jacket with your dress. This makes the look exciting, desirable unmistakable. Passport is brand that knows how to create contemporary mix of styles. Most important all that: love for detail and the highest demands on design, quality, and workmanship. Passport blends simple economic price architecture with the look and emotion of premium product. Passport bietet Mode. Die Looks Passport berühren verkörpern Lebensgefühl selbstbewussten, extrovertierten Frau. Sie unterliegt Diktat Mode. Sie lebt persönlichen Stil. Feminin farbenfroh. Aktiv informiert. Authentisch unangestrengt. Sie liebt alltagstaugliche Looks, Uhr funktionieren neu interpretieren individuell kombinieren kann.
